slide.title: How to parse XML
slide.blurb: Basically we can use a *functional* or an *object oriented* programming approach. We will start using functions to handle the parsing.

list.title: When using functions we need to
list.bullet: Create callback functions to handle start and end tags, content, attributes, etc.
Keep track of where in the parsing process we are by using a stack structure and/or a group of global variables.
Plan carefully the structure to generate from the XML document.
